page.title: 19Shops and Businesses
page.content: There are no large shops or businesses in the Garton area apart from Burgess's which is dealt with separately.There are three small house builders,a joiner,a stress welder and a precision tool maker. There are two general stores one of which is also the Post Office.There is a butcher's shop which opens on request.One unusual retailer is a high class ladies fashion boutique based on a farm. A whole variety of mobile shops trade in the area.Although the villagers and farmers would like better shopping facilities there is not the population to support them.Driffield,which is a busy market town, is only two and a half miles away.
